channel.title: Ramon Suarez's curiosity lead learning life
channel.description: Recent content on Ramon Suarez's curiosity lead learning life

item.title: Books
item.description: This is my selection of entrepreneurship and business related books. I read a lot and try to implement what I find interesting. You may also want to check out my book summaries. Traction: Get a Grip on Your Business. Gino Wickman. Run your business as a self sustaining organism based on the key six components of the EOS (Entrepreneurial Operating System). Summary and review. The 12 Week Year: Get More Done in 12 Weeks than Others Do in 12 Months.

item.title: Scorecards
item.description: This is where I keep track of how my projects and plans are working out. I’m working on simplifying it and making it easier to use. Click here for a full window view. This is where I track the pomodoros I’ve scheduled and executed. I’m considering adding the type of work blocks, but I’ve not yet standardized them. Click here for a full window view.

item.title: Terms, Conditions & Privacy Policy
item.description: 1. Terms By accessing this web site, you are agreeing to be bound by these web site Terms and Conditions of Use, all applicable laws and regulations, and agree that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site. The materials contained in this web site are protected by applicable copyright and trade mark law.

item.title: Lessons Learned
item.description: This is the selection of lessons I’ve learned as a pragmatic and practicing entrepreneur. Dos Don’ts

item.title: Do You Want to Hear from Me?
Challenge Projects
item.description: Tirarse a la piscina (jumping into the pool), a great Spanish expression for daring. Image by Oliver Sjöström. These are the projects I’m working on as part of my entrepreneurship challenge. I will be updating the links as I move on with each project (you can also check the Progress Report category): Free Coworking Community Webinarcoworking.space directory: a free directory of sales oriented landing pages for coworking spaces. Launch Update
